name: Astromage: Rage of the Elements
description:
Astromage: Rage of the Elements is a VR on-rails-shooter game, where you use your controllers to draw constellation patterns on the screen to cast elemental spells and use them against your enemies to survive the various auto-scrolling levels.

This is a single level that is meant for VR only. It works on Valve Index, Oculus Rift and HTC Vive.

Feedback is very welcome!

Please fill the feedback document of reach out on social media!

The team consists of six Finnish game development students.

Design & Audio: Jaakko Ylimäki
Programming: Juhani Ålander & Henri Väisänen
Art: Taru Verkkonen & Sofia Pietarinen
Production & Marketing: Veera Nuorteva

Find us on: https://twitter.com/Astromagegame
